title: The Fire Dragon Audio Pack
description: The Fire Dragon pack is an audio pack you can use to create the sounds of a big fire-breathing dragon
longDescription:
This is a construction pack that includes numerous audio files for creating sounds of a Fire Breathing Dragon.


Demo:

https://www.littleart.shop/copy-of-poison-dragon-pack


I have included

Fight Sounds

Fire Sounds (from Fire Balls to Infernos)

Steps Sound on different surfaces

Vocalization Sounds for adding to your project


Bite Crush 1 The sound of a bite crushing down

Bite Crush 2 The sound of a bite crushing down

Bite Crush 3 The sound of a bite crushing down

Bite Crush 4 The sound of a bite crushing down

Bite Crush 5 The sound of a bite crushing down

technicalDetails:
Features:

  • Dragon Vocalization
  • Dragon Fire Breaths
  • Dragon Bites
  • Dragon Paw and Tail Swings
  • Dragon Footsteps
  • Dragon Wing Sounds
  • Dragon Fire (Fire Ball Fire spew and Raging fire sounds)


Number of Audio Waves: 180

Number of Audio Cues: 180

Sample rate/bit rate: 44,100 Hz 24bit

Do Sound FX loop: Some of them do

Minutes of audio provided: 11 Min

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes

Documentation: https://www.littleart.shop/_files/ugd/f40aa8_ed61311e94c549f7b6a9dd6b75c9450b.pdf

Important/Additional Notes: None
